Song.title: Whom Have I In Heaven
Song.copyright: © 1997 Jon Bloom All rights reserved. Used by permission

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [D A/C# F#/A# Bm Bm7 G Asus A D G/A A]
VERSE: [D]Whom have I in [A/C#]heaven [F#/A#]but [Bm]you, O Lo[D/A]rd And [G]earth has nothing [D/F#]That I des[Em11]ire bes[G/A]ides [A]you My [D]flesh and my [A/C#]heart [F#/A#]may [Bm]fail, O Lo[D/A]rd But [G]you are the s[G/A]trength of [A]my h[D]eart [(repeat G/A A)]
CHORUS: [Em7]And [D/F#]my [G9]portion My [F#m7]portion [Em7]You are my [Asus4]portion [A]for--[Dsus-D]ever [Em7]You’re [D/F#]my p[G9]ortion My [F#m7]portion [Em7]You are my [Asus4]portion [A]for--[D]ever [(to intro)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse whom have i in heaven but you o lord and earth has nothing that i desire besides you my flesh and my heart may fail o lord but you are the strength of my heart chorus and my portion my portion you are my portion forever youre my portion my portion you are my portion forever
